properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters OF Southwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 4:17AM AST until January 20 at 6:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...NORTHERLY SWELL AND WIND-DRIVEN SEAS WILL GENERATE HAZARDOUS
SEAS ACROSS THE REGION...

.The combination of a northerly swell and wind-driven seas will
generate hazardous seas across the local waters through early
next week. Fresh to strong winds and frequent gusty winds are also
expected during this period.

* WHAT...East winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6
to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters OF Southwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 2 PM Sunday to 6 PM AST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Conditions
will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Conditions
will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SUNDAY TO 6 PM AST MONDAY
